docs.text:
Welcome to MkDocs


For full documentation visit 
mkdocs.org
.


Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: What else might I have to install?
Java

docs.text: Java is a computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible. The principle idea behind Java's design is being able to run on any platform that has the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) installed.
docs.title: What is Java?

docs.text: Many people initialy find programming very confusing to learn. The main reason is that when you program, you need to think like a computer. Once you understand the computational thinking that programming intails, it becomes much easier. If you are struggling to learn Java, you could try using  Scratch  which lets you learn the most important concepts while not having to worry about the syntax since you just drag and drop blocks.  Once you learn the bascis, make sure to try and work on a simple project (such as a basic calculator, number guessing game, or rock paper scissors) in order to reinforce concepts. A great place to go if you are struggling and need help is  StackOverflow .
docs.title: How do I learn Java or any other programming language?
Variables
Arithmetic Operators
Conditional Operators (and if statements)
if-then and if-then-else statement
While Statement
For Loop
Arrays
public, private, static, and void
